Asegura que desde su juventud, siempre soñó con tener su propio taller, por lo cual siente gran satisfacción al ver que su sueño está a punto de materializarse.
Una de sus grandes ventajas es que cuenta con muchos clientes del sector, por lo cual alcanzará el punto de equilibrio en un menor tiempo.
texts.en:
María, 38, has been sewing clothes for more than ten years; she currently works in a sewing workshop.  With her vision and wish to get ahead, she’s now decided to create her own workshop which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy three sewing machines with the purpose of providing quality service improving her economic condition and securing a proper life for her 8-month-old son.

She states that since her youth she’s always dreamed with having her own workshop so she feels a great satisfaction to see that her dream is about to materialize.  One of the great advantages she has is that she has many customers in the sector so she should reach a point of equilibrium in a shorter period of time.

loans.use: to buy three sewing machines.

loans.name: León Dario

texts.es:
León de 39 años de edad, es padre de tres hijos. Radicado en le campo desde su juventud. Se dedica al cultivo de cebolla, cilantro y fríjol desde hace más de ocho años en un lote de propiedad familiar.  Con el desarrollo de su actividad, genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su núcleo familiar. Asegura que el amor por el campo lo adquirió gracias a sus padres quienes le enseñaron acerca del oficio. Hoy desea mejorar y ampliar sus cultivos, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de de insumos agrícolas como abonos y semillas. 
Sueña con terminar de cancelar su vivienda y adquirir una pequeña parcela para independizarse.
texts.en:
León, age 39, has three children.  He has been in the fields since his youth.  He has been growing onions, cilantro, and beans for over eight years.  He grows on a lot that belongs to the family.  With the development of his business activity he generates the income he needs to support his family.  He affirms that he acquired a love for the field thanks to his parents, who taught him about this trade.

He now wishes to improve and expand his crops.  That is why he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies like fertilizers and seeds.

He dreams of finishing paying for his house and of getting a small parcel of land in order to become independent.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizers and seeds).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goods (chicken, refreshments, cooking oil, alcoholic beverages, etc.) in order to stock up on merchandise.

loans.name: Ocampo Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Ocampo Poty está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, donde cada una de las miembros quiere crecer, no solo en lo económico sino también en lo personal.
La Sra. Mirtha es una de las integrantes, tiene su pequeño negocio de una despensa. Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de su grupo, de la fundación y su trabajo su negocio vaya creciendo, ya que es el único medio que ella tiene para ayudar a su familia. Ella se define a sí misma como una persona que trabajar y que lucha día con día.
Ella solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de frutas, verduras, carne, panificados, productos a granel y demás insumos de primera necesidad para poder surtir su negocio y dar a sus clientes lo que piden.
texts.en:
The Ocampo Poty group is participating in its 2nd loan cycle within the Women's Committee program.  The group is from the city of Caaguazú and every one of its members wants to grow, not only in a financial sense but also in a personal sense.  

Mirtha is a member of this group.  She has a small grocery store business and hopes to grow her business over time with the help of her group, Fundación Paraguaya and through her own hard work.  This is the only means she has for helping her family.  She describes herself as a person who has to work hard every single day.

Mirtha is requesting this loan to invest in buying fruit, vegetables, meat, baked goods, bulk goods and other basic household products with which to stock her business so that she can give her customers what they ask for.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, meat, baked goods and bulk goods

loans.name: Amparo De Jesús

texts.es:
Amparo tiene 63 años de edad, de los cuales lleva más de 20 años dedicada al oficio de la confección a terceros. En conjunto con su esposo, han luchado para garantizarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. 
Sueña con tener una estabilidad económica y gozar de una vejez sin preocupaciones, deseos que busca lograr a través del crecimiento de su negocio, consolidándolo como un taller de confección en el cual pueda ofrecerle empleo a las personas más vulnerables de su localidad. Razón que la ha motivado a solicitar un crédito para la compra de una máquina plana, lo que le permitirá   amentar su capacidad de producción, mejorando sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Amparo, 63 years old, has spent 20 years in the business of garment manufacture for third parties. Together with her husband, they have struggled to ensure a better quality of life for their family. She dreams of having economic stability and enjoying her old age without preoccupations. 
She seeks to fulfill her dreams by growing her business, consolidating it as a garment manufacturing workshop where she can employ more vulnerable people in her area. 

The reason why she is requesting a loan is to buy a sewing machine, which will permit her to increase her production capacity, improving her income and the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Laura

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 5 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola e os restantes já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante vende produtos diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, cervejas, vinhos, sumos, e outros), para aumentar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é criar mecanismos de obter mais rendimento para pagar o empréstimo e pedir outros para projectos futuros.
texts.en:
Laura is married and has five children. Two of her children attend school and the other ones are already adults. She lives in a house that she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a merchant who sells various products. With the current loan she intends to purchase products (refreshments, beer, wine, juice, etc.) in order to stock up on merchandise.
Her wish for the future is to make her business grow and improve her family's living conditions. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is creating ways to increase her profits in order to repay the loan and request other loans for her future projects.

loans.use: to purchase products (refreshments, beer, wine, juice, etc.) in order to stock up on merchandise.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: El Sr. Eusebio  tiene 24 años el se dedica a la venta  de madera y producción de carbón desde hace ya varios años esta actividad lo aprendió de su padre quien también se dedicaba a la producción de carbón, el tiene su parcela que se encuentra ubicado en la localidad de Primavera, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Eusebio  utilizara  este préstamo  para  la compra de moto sierras para cortar  madera para la producción de carbón, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra de estas herramientas de trabajo, ya que esto no le permite cortar en mayor cantidad, El Sr. Eusebio    enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza  va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida y la  de su familia, , ya que esta es su única actividad que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia, por este motivo se siente feliz ya agradecido a la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Eusebio is twenty four years old. His main occupation is the sale of wood and the production of charcoal. He has several years of experience in this line of work, which he learned from his father. He has a plot of land located in the Primavera location.  

This loan will be his first with this institution. Eusebio will use the loan to purchase an electric saw, which will allow him to cut wood to make charcoal. He is requesting the loan because he lacks sufficient capital to purchase the tools for his work. As is, he cannot cut enough wood.

One challenge Eusebio confronts in his business is getting out of poverty. He will use the benefits of this loan to improve the quality of life of both him and his family, as this is his only means of making a living for his family. He is happy and grateful to the institution for the support it has provided.

loans.use: purchase an electric saw.

loans.name: Deisy Yurani

texts.es:
Deisy es una joven de 20 años de edad, a quien le apasiona el mundo de los negocios. Sueña en un futuro próximo, con tener una cadena de tiendas de ropa y accesorios.
Su familia se dedica al comercio, por lo cual conoce y tiene experiencia en la actividad, razones por las que se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará en la compra de accesorios como collares, pulseras aretes, entre otros, con el fin de comercializarlos en su sector e iniciar con su proyecto de empresa. 
Asegura que con las ganancias que obtendrá iniciará sus estudios universitarios con el fin de convertirse en una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Deisy is a young woman of twenty years who is passionate about the business world. She dreams of a near future when she has a chain of clothing and accessory stores. Her family is also in business, which is why she is both familiar with and has experience in this line of work. 

She is asking for a loan which will be used to buy accessories such as necklaces, bracelets, and earrings, among other items. She will sell these in her area and launch her enterprise. With her profits, she is sure of earning enough to begin her university studies with the goal of becoming a great professional.

loans.use: purchase accessories like necklaces, bracelets, and earrings for resale.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es: El Sr. Ronald tiene 33 años, tiene un hijo de 12 años de edad su actividad es la venta de vidrios en su vidriería que se encuentran en la localidad La Guardia el Sr. Ronald es cliente antiguo de la institución, cuenta que le fue bien con los anteriores créditos, ya que le permiten crecer en su negocio, utilizara el crédito para la compra de variedad de vidrios para surtir su mercadería y también la compra de maquinas para la vidriería, El Sr. Ronald enfrenta retos en su negocio que son  la falta de materiales y maquinas y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando herramientas y materiales para su vidriería ya que poco a poco va creciendo, esta es su única actividad con la que mantiene a su familia su deseo es tener un negocio grande y rentable que le permita generar más ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ronald, 33, has a 12-year-old son and his activity is selling glass in his glass shop located in La Guardia.  Ronald is a long-standing client of the institution and he relates that he did well with the previous loans because they made it possible for his business to grow.  He will use the loan to buy a variety of glass to stock up on merchandise and also to buy machines for his glazier shop.

The business challenge Ronald faces is lack of materials and machinery and he will use profits to continue to buy tools and supplies for his glazier shop since it’s been growing little by little.  This is the only activity he has to support his family with and his wish is to have a big, profitable business that will make it possible for him to generate more income thus improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy glass at wholesale.

loans.name: Jonh Fredy

texts.es: John de 42 años de edad, laboró durante cuatro años en conjunto con sus amigos en diferentes carnicerías de su localidad. Desde hace un año decidió independizarse y crear su propio negocio dedicado a la comercialización de carne, venta de legumbres y huevos. Gracias a su labor ha podido ofrecerle a su hijo de cinco años una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades. Sueña con seguir creciendo y convertir su negocio el número uno, razón que lo ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un congelador, carnes frías y lácteos, con el fin aumentar su línea de productos y garantizar un mejor servicio a su comunidad.
texts.en: John, 42, worked for four years in partnership with his friends in various local butcher shops.  A year ago he decided to become independent and start his own business selling meat, vegetables and eggs.  Thanks to his work he’s been able to provide his 5-year-old son with an improved quality of life and better opportunities.  He dreams with continuing growing and turning his business into number one which is what has propelled him to request a loan to buy a freezer, cold-cuts and dairy products in order to increase his line of products and insure better service for his community.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, cold-cuts and dairy products.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos, dos quais 4 frequentam Escola e o outro já maior de idade, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante vende produtos alimentares e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, óleo, farinha, frangos, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.  
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio construindo um estabelecimento comercial e concluir a obra da sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é criar mecanismos de conseguir mais rendimento para realizar todos seus projectos.
texts.en:
Marcela is married and has five children. Four of her children attend school and the other one is already an adult. She lives in a house that she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a merchant who sells foodstuffs. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, cooking oil, flour, chickens, etc.) in order to stock up on merchandise.
Her wish for the future is to expand her business by building a store, and also finish the construction work on her house. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is creating ways to increase her profits in order to accomplish all her projects.

loans.use: to purchase goods (rice, cooking oil, flour, chickens, etc.) in order to stock up on merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Arselia Epifania

texts.es: La Sra. Arselia  sigue con la actividad de la elaboración y venta de desayunos cuenta que le va muy bien,  el anterior crédito lo utilizo en la compra de harina  para la elaboración de empanadas,  creció en su actividad e incremento su clientela, y por ende sus ingresos económicos, en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de desayunos como azúcar y harina, café y distintos mates por mayor, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Arselia continues with her business of preparing and selling breakfasts. She says that it is going very well and that she used her last loan to buy flour to make empanadas. Her business and customer base have grown, and so have her revenues. At this moment she requests a loan to buy ingredients for the preparation of breakfasts, such as sugar and flour, coffee and different types of teas at wholesale. She is happy and thankful for the new opportunity.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare breakfasts

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y crianza de pollo. Ella tiene 38 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, los cuales estudian; el oficio lo realiza desde hace 10 años y lo lleva a cabo junto con su esposo para el consumo familiar.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas, entre otros; este le ayudara a tener los materiales agrícolas necesarios para obtener una mejor cosecha de maíz.
 Su sueño es seguir mejorando su vivienda y apoyar a sus hijos hasta donde sea posible.
texts.en:
Rosa grows corn and raises chickens. She is 38 years old. She lives with her husband and their children, who are in school. She has been doing this work for 10 years, and she performs it with her husband for family use.

The loan that she needs will allow her to buy compost, herbicides, insecticides, and pesticides, among other items. This will help her to have the agricultural materials necessary to obtain a better corn harvest.

Her dream is to continue improving her house and to support her children as much as possible.

loans.use: to buy compost, herbicides, insecticides, and pesticides, among other items.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: La Sra. Francisca  sigue con la actividad de la venta de comida cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de mesas y sillas para su restaurante, creció en su actividad e incremento su clientela, y por ende sus ingresos económicos, en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de de un frizer para mantener sus refrescos y jugos  bien conservados, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Francisca still has her business selling food. She says that it went well with the previous loan, as she used it to buy tables and chairs for her restaurant. Her business grew, and she increased her clientele and therefore her income. 

On this occasion she has applied for a loan so that she can buy a freezer for properly storing her soft drinks and juices. She feels happy and grateful for this new opportunity that she is being offered.

loans.use: To buy a freezer.

loans.name: Norma Orbelina

texts.es: Doña norma vive con su familia en casa propia, ella tiene un negocio de venta de embutidos, carne y pollos desde hace varios años en un mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir los gastos que tiene en su hogar, doña norma esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar pollos, carnes y embutidos por mayor para poder surtir su negocio con mas productos para que sus clientes siempre estén satisfechos a la hora que le llegan a comprar y ella pueda obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor vida con su familia
texts.en:
Norma lives with her family in their own house. For several years, she has had a business selling cold cuts, meat and chickens, in a market near her home. With the earnings she gets from her sales, she manages to cover her household expenses.

Norma is requesting a loan so that she can buy chickens, meats and cold cuts at wholesale, in order to stock her business with more products, so that her customers are always satisfied when they come to buy. This will enable her to obtain better earnings, which will help her and her family have a better life.

loans.use: To buy chickens, meat and cold cuts at wholesale.

loans.name: El

texts.en:
El lives in the peaceful village of Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is 46 years old and married with three children. At home, she sells packaged noodle soup to the surrounding people and it has been a supplementary business to her rice farming. From selling activities, she can earn a net profit of USD 5.00 each day and she uses it for food and allowances for her school-aged children. Her aim is to access credit to expand to a vegetable-selling business.

El is applying for a loan of USD 1,500 to buy vegetables to sell. Her extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to expand her farming business. Her future plan is to go far in her businesses and give her children a better quality of life with a good education.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell

loans.name: Tumenjargal

texts.en: Mr. Tumenjargal, 30 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a rental apartment during the winter and when spring approaches, they move into their house on a plot of land. He has been working at the police department for nine consecutive years and progressed through his career from the lowest level to crime case file clerk. His wife stays at home looking after their two babies. He is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to purchase an automobile that runs on natural gas. The natural gas car has the advantage of wasting less fuel as well as releasing fewer pollutants compared to other engine powered cars. They moved into a house, which is far from his work office, so he needs an automobile. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase an automobile that runs on natural gas

loans.name: María Eugenia

texts.es: María Eugenia de 57 años de edad, luego de separase de su cónyuge decidió iniciar con una actividad con la cual pudiera generar sus ingresos para el sostenimiento y la educación de sus tres hijos, es así como decide iniciar desde su casa con la venta de productos por catálogo a familiares, conocidos y amigos. Actualmente pasa por dificultades económicas por lo que requiere de capital, el cual destinará para la compra de surtido, incrementando su volumen de ventas y mejorando la calidad de vida de su grupo familiar. Su mayor sueño es tener su propio una tienda de ropa, productos de belleza y accesorios.
texts.en:
María Eugenia is 57 years old. After separating from her partner, she decided to start a business in order to generate income for supporting and educating her three children. This is how she decided to start a home-based business selling catalog products to family members, friends and acquaintances. 

Currently she is experiencing financial challenges, so she needs capital, which she will earmark for purchasing stock, thereby increasing her volume of sales and improving her family's quality of life. 

Her greatest dream is to have her own store selling clothing, beauty products and accessories.

loans.use: To buy beauty and personal hygiene products.

loans.name: Gantulga

texts.en: Mr. Gantulga, 31 years old, lives with his wife and 11-year-old daughter in Kherlen, an eastern town of Mongolia. He has been working as a crane man at a building company for five consecutive years and was awarded more than twice by his employer as the best worker of the company. His wife works as a janitress at pharmacy. Using his previous loan, he renovated his barn and improved his family's living condition. Now he is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to purchase building materials such as planks, bricks, and concrete. Using these materials, he will make an extension to his barn, thus creating more space for his family and reducing heat loss through walls and floors. The effort to reduce house heat loss is an important contribution to the case against air pollution because it enables the family to burn less coal. The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for better future.

loans.use: to make extensions to his barn

loans.name: Ncucumo Twimukye Group

texts.en:
Beatrice has acquired a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX). She is 32-years-old and is married with four children, all of school-going age.

Beatrice is part of a group called Ncucumo Twimukye. She is in her third loan cycle and works in agriculture growing bananas which she uses to feed her family. Beatrice also sells some of the bananas to generate income to pay tuition for her children.

Beatrice will use this particular loan to buy organic manure in the form of cow dung, which she will spread in her plantation. This will improve the size of her bananas and also the quality of the plantation, helping to increase her income. She is grateful to her group for being supportive and thanks Kiva for partnering with them.

Beatrice hopes to expand her business. One challenge is banana wilt, which has affected production. Beatrice is a hardworking and honest lady. 

In the photo are the group members. The tenth member is resting this cycle but he has signed the waiver form. The UGAFODE credit officer is standing at the extreme right in a tie.

loans.use: to buy organic manure to use as mulch for her banana plants.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: Zainab is a 33-year-old married woman and mother to five children. Her husband is a painter who works hard to earn a living for him and his family. At the same time, Zainab does some embroidery work at home and arranges plastic flowers to be used as home decoration centerpieces. Now Zainab is applying for a loan to buy more fabric so she can make more embroidered pillowcases and buy more material for making plastic flowers.

loans.use: to buy more fabric so she can make more embroidered pillowcases and buy more material for making plastic flowers.

loans.name: Shabana Group

texts.en: Shabana is a 36-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along with her husband and seven children. Her husband has been running a small hotel in the local market. Shabana, as a member of four-person group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. Her husband wants to renovate his hotel and also would do some required repair work in the hotel. He would purchase new furniture, such as chairs and tables, as well as curtains and a variety of carpets. This would attract more customers, and his sales would be increased. Shabana would spend the profit on the education of her children. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan. NOTE: In the picture Shabana is raising her hand

loans.use: to renovate her husband's hotel

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en: Dinah is 29 years old, single, and lives in Sebac, Tudela. She earns a living by selling rice and running a transportation service business. She has been doing this for three years and earns 5,000 PHP a month from this work. Dinah has applied for a loan of 15,000 PHP at GDMPC to pay maintenance costs and repairs for her motorcycle. Dinah joined GDMPC last year. Dinah hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay maintenance costs and repairs for her motorcycle

loans.name: Usama

texts.en:
Usama is 33-years-old. He is married and has five children, three of them attend primary school.

Usama has owned a shop for selling mobile phones and computer maintenance since 2011. He asked Ryada for this loan in order to buy a display reception and some maintenance tools for his mobile phone and computer maintenance shop.

Usama hopes that through this loan he will be able to increase the displayed goods and improve his income to provide his family with a better life and education.

loans.use: to buy a display reception and some maintenance tools for his mobile phone and computer maintenance shop.

loans.name: Arriane Mae

texts.en: Arraine Mae, a 27-year-old woman from Sebac, Tudela, Misamis Occidental, renders transportation services to the local community for a living. She earns 5,000 PHP monthly from this service business. She offers the unit for rental to her neighbor to have income too. Since joining GDMPC micro credit in the year 2012, she has always been grateful that it helps to uplift their lives. Now, she is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. In the future, she plans to buy another unit of motorcycle to expand her transport services.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a 27-year-old married lady; she has no kids till now. Her husband is currently serving with the military. In the meantime Maryam makes decoration pieces and straw baskets at home for sale.  Although it’s a small business, it helps make an additional income for the family to pay the household bills while her husband is away. 

Now Maryam is applying for a youth loan to purchase some raw material like silicon, straw and others to increase the quantity of items she makes for sale.

loans.use: to acquire some raw materials like silicon, straw and others to increase the quantity of items she makes for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 29-year-old and sells second-hand clothes. She resides in the Dansoman community and joined ID Ghana in 2010.

Mary has been in this business for the past seven years and is doing very well. She is very good and discreet when it comes to her business. 

This is her seventh loan and is for an amount of 1,000 Ghana Cedis (GHS). The loan will help Mary to expand her business and buy brassieres and one bale of second-hand clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy brassieres and one bale of second-hand clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Ismail

texts.en:
Ismail is grateful to the Kiva lenders for funding his first loan. With the loan his business expanded and so did his profit margin. He was able to begin construction of a residential house for his family in order to cut out the renting costs. 

Ismail requests a loan to buy iron sheets for roofing his residential house. With this, he will be able to house his family comfortably and his expenses will also reduce. Ismail is a hard working and resilient man who wants the best for his family.

loans.use: to buy roofing materials for his residential house.

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en:
Walaa is a 24-year-old married woman who is a mother of one child. She has worked in selling beauty cosmetics and accessories from her house since 2011. Walaa helps her husband with their family's income and puts much effort into developing her business in order to increase her income and provide her family with the necessary standards of living.

Walaa is applying for a youth loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to purchase new cosmetics, accessories, and medical earrings. Her business isn't stable in one place; she is mobile among family, friends, relatives, and neighbors, and foreigners.

She is planning to open her own shop in the future to settle down and develop her family's living.

loans.use: To purchase new cosmetics, accessories, and medical earrings

loans.name: Matenne

texts.en:
Matenne lives at Sinkor in Montserrado County, the capital city of Liberia, well-known as the commercial city  of Liberia. She is 43 years old. She is married with three children between the ages of 13 and 21. Only one is in school and lives at home. 

For the past two years now Matenne has been running a shop where she sells used clothes. She started this business with the help of her father and learned this way of selling from friends. She likes her business because it gives her more profits and makes her popular. She is requesting a loan to buy more used clothes for her business. She wants to get more money to build her house.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Khurram

texts.en:
Khurram is a 34-year-old man. He lives in Pakistan with his wife, three sons and a daughter. 

He owns a cosmetics shop in the market. His income is too low to cover their household expenses. Therefore he is planning to expand his business so that he can increase his net income and savings. He has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase cosmetic products like lipsticks, facial creams, etc. 

With the profit he will first pay back the loan. Khurram's dream is to provide the best and quality education to his children. He wants to thank all the BRAC staff for being so co-operative.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of cosmetic products to sell.

loans.name: Doha

texts.en:
Doha is a 27-year-old married woman and mother of one child. Doha has been selling gifts and accessories for the last eight years. In December 2011, she opened her present shop and improved her family's living a lot. Today, Doha is applying for a YOUTH LOAN from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua.It will be her second loan cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower with a good history of repaying her loan. She will use the loan to increase her Brazilian gold and accessories collection. This loan will increase her income in parallel with the increase in business capital collection.

She supports her beloved husband a lot in their family's income and expenses and she's very happy doing so because they are one happy family, as she describes.

She hopes to keep on developing both her social and financial living as much as she can and to provide her child with the best education ever.

loans.use: To buy more Brazilian gold and accessories to sell

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is a youth client of 26 years of age who is married and has two children. Ali is the sole provider for the family.

Ali owns a small shop where he sells electrical equipment like ovens, refrigerators and air-conditioners. He established his business in 2011 and gained experience through previously working at his father's shop. After gaining enough experience, he established his own business and now he has hired his own employee. Ali is growing with fame and respect in his neighborhood.

Ali is requesting a youth loan of 2,100 USD to pay the annual rent of his shop. He aim is to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may provide his family with a better living standard.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his shop

loans.name: Tabah

texts.en:
Tabah lives at Sinkor in Montserrado County, the capital city of Liberia, well-known as the commercial city  of Liberia. Tabah is 46 year old, married with four children between the ages of 20 and 27. 

For the past three years  now, Tabah has been running  a cook shop where she sells rice  and soup. She started this business with money given to her by her husband, and  she likes her business because it gives her more money and makes her independent. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more food ingredients such as peppers, bitter ball (squash), Vita, and other items for her business. She wants to get more money to build a house and be an international businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy more food ingredients such as peppers, bitter ball (squash), Vita, and other items for her business

loans.name: Zaheer

texts.en:
Zaheer is 39 years old. He lives in Pakistan with his wife, two sons and a daughter. He owns a food stall in the market, where he sells tasty and delicious kabab. His income is too low to cover their household expenses. 

Presently, he is in need of purchasing oil, eggs, pulses (lentils) and beef for preparing kabab. For that reason, he has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase the needed food items for his stall. 

With the profit he will first pay back the loan. Zaheer's dream is to provide the best and quality education to his children. He wants to thank all the BRAC staff for being so co-operative.

loans.use: To purchase oil, eggs, pulses and beef for preparing kabab

loans.name: Annety

texts.en:
Annety is a resident of the Likoni area of Coast province, Kenya. She is a married mother of two children, although only one has begun schooling. This is her only source of income currently and she looks forward to improving the operations within it. She hires workers on a casual basis.

Annety is applying for a loan of 26,250 Kenya shillings to purchase quarry tools and pay the casual laborers. The main challenge is lack of effective transport for the stones from the quarry to the selling site.

loans.use: To purchase quarry tools and pay the casual laborers.

loans.name: Babken

texts.en:
Young farmer Babken lives in Ddmashen village in the region of Sevan. He has a big family consisting of several members: he and his wife, their two sons, his mother and brother. It is a big, genial and consolidated family, always ready to help each other. In their farm they have three cows, five sheep, twenty chickens and two piglets, but the main wealth of their farm are beehives and bee colonies that they have enriched with the help of his previous Kiva loan. The honey that they have is of very high quality and unbelievably good taste. It is the result of hard and honest work during the whole year.

Babken again wants to work with Kiva lenders and is asking for a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian drams to expand both his bee colonies and farm animals. He wants to buy a cow and a calf. Babken is sure that his second cooperation with Kiva will be as useful as the first one.

loans.use: To add to his beehives and to buy a cow and calf

loans.name: Gharam

texts.en: Gharam is a 19-year-old married lady. She started a small home business with her husband’s sister selling clothing items to friends and neighbors using both of their connections. Now Gharam is applying for a youth loan to buy more female clothing items in the new summer fashion.

loans.use: to buy more female clothing items to sell

loans.name: Hadi

texts.en:
Hadi is an 18-year-old single man who has been an employee in a mobile phone sales shop for five years. Hadi was only thirteen years old when he started working in order to help his parents in their living and cover his own expenses.

Hadi is working hard to develop himself and improve his living. That's why he applied for a YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to invest part of it in doing necessary maintenance for his car and at the same time start a small mobile phone sales business with capital of his own as a first step forward.

Hadi is a man with a very good reputation, well known in his region. He is a hard worker; he is still studying in the morning, where he starts his work in the afternoon. He hopes that one day he can reach a level where he can settle down and enjoy developing his own business in the future.

loans.use: To start his own small business and do necessary maintenance for his car

loans.name: Gabriel Antonio

texts.es: Gabriel, está casado, tiene la edad de 36 años, vive con su esposa y 3 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va compra las telas para la elaboración de sus nuevos uniformes. El tiene conformado desde ya varios años su mariachi por lo cual cree conveniente el cambio de vestimenta para ser mas innovadores al igual que tener más clientela y a la vez generar una muy buena impresión a la hora de presentarse a sus labores. El con el mariachi tiene un ingreso extra para su familia y además le brinda otros ingresos a otras personas por tocar con el en las presentaciones, por lo cual espera aumentar contrataciones para este siguiente temporada y salir adelante con sus proyectos y brindarle un ingreso extra a sus compañeros y al igual que el tener un futuro más estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gabriel is 36 years old and is married.  He lives with his wife and 3 children, who are his first priority.  With this loan, he is going to buy fabric for making new uniforms for his mariachi band.  He has been a part of the mariachi band for several years, and for this reason he believes it is time to change their uniform to be more innovative so that they can gain more clients.  He wants to make a good impression at his shows.  Working in the mariachi band brings in extra income for his family and also offers income to other band members who perform at the shows.  Gabriel hopes to increase hiring for this next season and to move forward with the band's projects to provide extra income to his companions and secure a more stable economic future.  This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had any prior loans in state banks, but FUNDECOSUR has given him a loan with a better payment plan and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy uniforms for his mariachi band

loans.name: Jose Saul

texts.es:
José, se le presenta la necesidad de seguir invirtiendo en el negocio; este le permitirá comprar una cámara y papel fotográfico para una mejor calidad en las fotos.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su equipo; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado.
texts.en: José has presented the need to continue investing in his business; this loan will allow him to purchase a camera and photography paper to improve the quality of his photos.  The previous loan helped him to increase his income and improve his equipment.  His financial condition and family circumstances have been greatly improved.

loans.use: to purchase a camera and photography paper for better quality in his photos.

loans.name: Gladys Group

texts.en:
The group is made up of five partners: Gladys, Sabaina, Augustina, Lydia and Jonathan who all reside in Dansoman. They have been a group since 2009 and are doing very well. They sell bread, phones, fried plantain, jeans and provisions, respectively. 

Gladys is a 54-year-old bread seller. She is a widow. This has been her work for the past 10 years and is doing very well. Because of her integrity and frankness, all her customers have her at heart. She has been with ID Ghana for the past four years and still loves to be part of the organization. She has taken seven loans and has fully repaid all of them. For her eighth loan, she is requesting GHS 1,000 to help her buy enough flour, sugar, and margarine to bake bread to sell to customers. 

The entire group needs a loan of GHS 4,400 to buy more goods to sell to their respective customers in and around the community.

loans.use: To buy flour to bake bread to sell

loans.name: Zafar

texts.en: Zafar is a 43-year-old woman living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her spouse and six children. Since 2005, her husband has been running a small vegetable shop. Zafar has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for the expansion of her husband's shop. With the loan investment, he can buy a variety of fresh vegetables that will allow him to offer more varieties to his clients and increase his sales and income. Zafar's husband is a very hard-working and honest man and is confident about his family’s bright future.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of vegetables

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is 36 years old and comes from Ramallah. She is married and has two children who attend primary school. She has owned a beauty salon since 2003.

Manal asked Ryada for this loan in order to buy a laser machine for skin facial cleansing for her salon. This loan will help her increase her clients and thus improve her income.

loans.use: to buy a laser machine for skin facial cleansing for her salon.

loans.name: Keneth

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 41-year-old Keneth from Bulawayo. He is married with one child, who attends school. Keneth runs a retail business buying men's jeans, trousers, shoes, and jackets for resale. He also buys electrical gadgets for resale, like adaptors and cellphone accessories, and women's clothing too. The business has been in operation for 8 years. He says the main challenges faced are lack of working capital, and exorbitant duty charges when declaring goods at the border. Keneth has requested a loan of $300 to order more stock and restock new products for winter. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to have more disposable income, which will enable him to pay for rentals and other day-to-day expenses. In the future Keneth plans to own a clothing and electrical shop in the Central Business District.

loans.use: to buy men's clothing from outside the country (where it is cheaper), electrical gadgets, and women's clothing for resale.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julian tiene 36 años de edad, es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene seis hijos, él es una persona trabajadora que desde muy temprana edad se dedica  a la ganadería y a la agricultura, pero en sus horas libres trabaja en el área de obra en una entidad pública. Desde hace varios años  pertenece al banco comunal “El Balcon” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abono.

Julian nació en el distrito de Challabamba pero vive en la comunidad de Majopata anexo de la comunidad de Carnicero. (La comunidad de Majopata está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Julian is 36 years old and is married.  The fruit of his beautiful marriage is six children.  Julian is a hardworking person that from an early age has been dedicated to working with livestock and agriculture.  In his free time, he also works at a public agency.  For several years he has been a member of the communal bank "El Balcon," and this time he needs a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.

Julian was born in the district of Challabamba, but now he lives in the community of Majopato, a settlement in Carnicero.  The community of Majopata is located in the district of Challabamba in the province of Paucartambo, within the Department of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Willian Napoleón

texts.es:
Willian tiene 25 años de edad, esta casado y tiene un hijo. Se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 10 años de edad; fue su padre quien le enseño. También, trabaja cuidando unos animales y bueyes. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. a ordeñar una vaca y ha enyugar sus bueyes, se toma una tasa de café y luego se dirige al terreno en donde tiene sus cultivos y tarda una hora en llegar. Ahí trabaja durante 8 horas, se regresa a su casa a alimentar sus bueyes. Manifiesta estar muy agradecido con su padre porque le enseño  a trabajar. Él camina aproximadamente 10 minutos de su casa hasta el lugar en donde aborda un camión que hace su recorrido de una hora a hora y media. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 8 sacos de fertilizantes, una bolsa de semilla, dos galones de herbicidas, dos litros de pesticidas y para pago de mano de obra para sembrar maíz.  Él ya tiene el terreno para cultivar, pero no el dinero para comprar los insumos y el invierno ya comenzó y necesita el dinero para empezar a sembrar y que su cosecha sea abundante, ya que es a lo único que se dedica y de ahí obtiene el alimento para su familia. Espera recibir ingresos para ahorrar y construir su propia casa, debido a que esta viviendo con sus padres.
texts.en:
Willian is 25 years old, married and has a son.  He has been a farmer since he was ten years old and learned this from his father.  He also works with some animals and oxen.  He gets up at 4:00 am and milks a cow and yoke up the oxen.  He has a cup of coffee and then goes to the fields where he has his crops.  It takes him an hour to get there.  There he works for eight hours and returns home to feed his oxen.  He says that he is very grateful to his father because he taught him how to work.  He walks about 10 minutes from his house to where he takes the bus to make his one and a half hour trip.

He is asking for this loan through Fundación Campo, so he can buy eight sacks of fertilizer, a bag of seeds, two gallons of herbicide, two liters of pesticides, and pay for labor to plant corn.  He already has farmland but not the money to buy supplies and the winter has already started and he needs money with which to plant so that he will have an abundant harvest.  This is the only thing he does to feed his family.  He hopes to have income to save up and build a house of his own because he is living with his parents.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Marther K.

texts.en: Marther  lives in Sinkor, in Montserrado County, where living conditions are almost like the capital city of Liberia. It is well known in Liberia. Marther is 44 years old and married. She has six children between the ages of seven and 30 years old. Two of her children are in school and live at home. For the past five years, Marther has been selling peppers, eggplant and bitter ball in the community market. She started this business with help from her husband and learned this way of selling from her mother. She spends eight hours on her business, and she uses a taxi most of the time to get her goods to her table, She said, "I am business minded, and like my business because it gives me more profit." Marther is requesting a loan to buy more peppers, eggplant and bitter ball to expand her sales. She wants to earn more money so she can build a house.

loans.use: to buy more peppers, eggplant and bitter ball to expand her sales,

loans.name: Saleem

texts.en:
Saleem is a 40-year-old hard-working man. He lives with his wife and four sons in Punjab, Pakistan. 

Since 2005, Saleem has had a general store, and he works very hard to meet his family's needs. He needs additional capital for the growth of his business. For that reason, he has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. 

With the loan money, he can buy a variety of goods for his general store, including biscuits, chips, juices and sweets to satisfy his clients more professionally as well as to increase his savings for a better future for his children.

Saleem is very hopeful that the loan will be a lucky and productive one for his family and business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products, such as biscuits, chips, juices and sweets, to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To order a mixture of soft drinks for resale at their shop

loans.name: Nuch

texts.en:
Nuch lives in Sinkor, Montserrado County, Liberia.  Nuch is a 24-year-old, single woman with two children, ages 3 and 7 years old.  Both are in school and live at home.  For the past five years she has been selling body-spray, body-cream, fashion-slippers, and others items.  Nuch started this business with the help of her father and learned this way of selling from him.  She likes her business because it gives her more profit and makes her popular.
She is requesting a loan to purchase more body-spray, body-cream, fashion-slippers, and additional goods for her business.  She wants to get more money to build her house since she has a piece of land.

loans.use: to purchase body-spray, body-cream, fashion-slippers, and additional goods for her business.

loans.name: Floice

texts.en:
Floice is a 30-year-old married lady with three children, ages 2, 5, and 9 years old.  She sells secondhand clothing and has been running the business for five years, earning a monthly income of 12,000 KES.  She learned about KADET LTD from a neighbor.

She has borrowed her fifth loan of 20,000 KES from KADET LTD.  With this loan she intends to purchase more clothing for the business.  The anticipated profit will be used to pay school fees for her school-going children.  Her dreams are to improve her living standards and to own a residential plot.

loans.use: to buy more stock of secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.es: Anthony  de 22  años de edad,  soltero y sin hijos, es una agradable estudiante de la facultad de Ingeniería De Sistemas   que estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Anthony  tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser un buen ingeniero de sistemas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones universitarias  y  realizar la compra  de útiles de estudio que necesita. Anthony    se encuentra muy agradecido  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a  kiva por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: Anthony is 22 years old, single and without children.  He is a pleasant student in the department of Systems Engineering. He studies a lot in order to achieve his goals in life.  Anthony hopes graduate from his studies with honors and to be a good systems engineer.  With this loan Anthony will pay his room and board at the university and will purchase the supplies that he needs to study.  Anthony is very grateful for the help and looks forward to finally completing his goals thanks to the help of Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay for his room and board at university

loans.name: Elsa Edith

texts.es:
Elsa, solicita un nuevo préstamo por otro crédito para seguir trabajando con su negocio de venta de tortillas; este le permitirá comprar 10 quintales de maíz y tener materia prima reservada.
El crédito anterior le ha ayudado a incrementar la clientela y satisfacer las necesidades de ellos; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Elsa is applying for a new loan to continue working in her business of selling tortillas. This will allow her to buy 10 quintales (about 1000 lb)  of corn and have a reserve of basic ingredients.

The previous loan has helped her to increase her clientele and satisfy their needs. Her economic conditions and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy 10 quintales of corn and have a reserve of basic ingredients

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 29 years old from Gaza.  He is married and has one child.  He owns a grocery store since 2010.  Mohammad asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy a display refrigerator and to install shelves in the grocery store.  He hopes that this loan will help him to increase the goods displayed and thus improve his income.  This will enable him to provide his child with the best education.

loans.use: to buy a display refrigerator and install shelves in the grocery store.

loans.name: Patricio Solis Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores una de ellas es Marisol mujer de 26 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos menores su negocio es la venta de flores artificiales, chischiles de palma, productos de limpieza de ropa como detergentes, jabón, cloro, hace etc. Esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 10 años, ella misma vende en el mercado de Granada. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para hacer adornos florales como plásticos, alambres, mechas, materia prima para hacer chischil como palma, tapas, madera etc., comercializa también cosa de horno, jabón, hace, cloro etc. Miriam tiene 45 años de edad y su negocio es fábrica de trensas de manila para sandalias y José hombre de 45 años de edad su negocio es artesanía en palma.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is Marisol, a 26 year old woman, who is in a long term relationship, and has two young children.  Her business is selling artificial flowers, chischiles (Nicaraguan rattles) made of palm, and cleaning products such as detergent, bleach, soap, etc.  She began this business 10 years ago and she makes her sales in the Granada market.  She will invest this loan in the purchase basic materials for floral arrangements like plastic, wires, and wax as well as basic materials to make chischil (traditional Nicaraguan rattle) such as palms, covers, wood, etc.  She also sells baking products, soap, bleach, etc.  

Miriam is 45 years old and her business is making braided and beaded sandal straps.  José is a 45 year old man whose business is producing handicrafts from palms.

loans.use: to purchase basic materials for floral arrangements like plastic, wires, and wax as well as basic materials to make chischil (traditional Nicaraguan rattle) such as palms, covers, wood, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel de 60 años de edad, es una de aquellas personas digna de admiración y respeto, las cuales enseñan que en la vida la actitud y el deseo de progreso es lo más importante. A pesar de encontrarse en condición de discapacidad, tras perder su mano derecha, este hombre siguió luchando por lo más importante para él; su familia. Desde hace 25 años labora como vendedor ambulante con el fin de ganarse el sustento para él y su familia. Diariamente sale a las calles con su carreta en donde comercializa mangos y aguacates. De esta manera Miguel ha logrado brindarle mejores oportunidades de vida a su familia. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una sombrilla (para la carreta) y surtido  con el fin de aumentar su nivel de ventas y no perjudicarse con las constantes lluvias.
texts.en: Miguel is 60 years old and is one of those people who is worthy of admiration and respect, who teach that your attitude and desire to progress is the most important thing in life.  Despite being disabled after losing his right hand, this man continues to fight for those most important to him: his family.  For 25 years he has worked as a traveling salesman in order to make a living for himself and his family.  Every day he goes out to the streets with his cart, where he sells mangos and avocados.  In this way, Miguel has managed to provide a better life for his family.  Today he is asking for this loan so that he can invest in an umbrella (for his cart) and an assortment of fruits in order to increase his level of sales and not have his business harmed by the constant rains.

loans.use: to buy an umbrella (for the cart) and an assortment of fruits (mango and avocado)

loans.name: Nubia Celene

texts.es:
Nubia de 29 años, es madre soltera de dos hijos menores de edad, por lo cuales lucha para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. Asegura que la creación de su negocio se debe a la buena intención de su padre para que ella generara el sustento para sus hijos, por lo cual le dio el capital inicial. Hoy lleva siete años dedicada a la venta de artículos de ferretería, actividad, que se ha constituido en su única fuente de ingresos. 
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido con el fin de mejorar el nivel de ventas y posicionar aún más su negocio en el sector.
Sueña con brindarles a sus hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Nubia is 29 years old.  She is a single mother of two young children, for whom she struggles to provide a better quality of life.  The building of her own business, with which she sustains her children, is due to the good intention of her father, who gave her the initial capital.  Today she has worked seven years selling hardware, an activity which has been their only source of income.  She is asking for this loan to invest in an assortment of hardware in order to improve her level of sales and position her business further ahead in the industry.

She dreams of giving her children a good education.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of hardware

loans.name: M.l. Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por  tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Patricia socia, mujer de 43 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos mayores de edad, tiene cinco años de tener su negocio de taller de zapatería, además vende sandalias los comercializa en los municipios de Diria, Diriomo y en la comunidad de palo quemado, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de sandalias bajas, sandalias de plataformas, zapato de hombre, zapato colegial etc. Marta tiene 54 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosa de horno y venta de nacatamales y Martha Lorena tiene 28 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon.
texts.en:
This group consists of three entrepreneurial members. One of the members is Patricia, a woman of 43. She is married and has two adult children. She has had her business, a shoe workshop, for five years. In addition, she sells sandals. She sells them in the towns of Diria and Diriomo and in the Palo Quemado region. She will invest the loan in the purchase of low sandals, platform sandals, men's shoes, school shoes, etc. 

Marta is 54 years old, and her business is selling "cosas de horno" [baked corn products] and nacatamales [a typical Nicaraguan dish]. Martha Lorena is 28, and her business is selling Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy low sandals, platform sandals, men's shoes, school shoes, etc., to sell

loans.name: Burulsun

texts.ru:
Бурулсун 50 лет, имеет 3 детей. Бурулсун в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается торговлей товарами народного спроса, стартовав в 1996 году с  суммы 15,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Бурулсун, она смогла купить дом для своей семьи, на сегодняшний день  ее прибыль составляет (KGS)20 000 сом. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бурулсун  обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение товарооборота посредством закупа партии мыломоющих средств.  Доходы от кредита Бурулсун планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, а в этом году построить забор.
texts.en: Burulsun is 50 years old and has three children. She is supporting her family by selling household goods at the local market. She started her business in 1996 with 15000 som. Due to her diligence Burulsun was able to buy a house for her family and now her business makes 20,000 som (KGS) in profits. In order to further develop her business Burulsun has turned to the micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to increase goods turnover in her store by purchasing a large batch of detergents. She is planning to use the profits from this loan to continue growing her business, and also build a fence around her house this year.

loans.use: to purchase a batch of detergents

loans.name: Tumara

texts.ru:
Тумаре 32 года, имеет 3 детей. Тумара в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 2003 году с  покупки коровы и овец на сумму 18,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Тумары, на сегодняшний день она имеет 4 дойные коровы, 10 овец и 2 лошади, ее прибыль составляет (KGS) 12,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Тумара  обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку еще одной дойной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Тумара  планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность обучить детей.
texts.en: Tumara is 32 years old and has three children. In order to support her family she raises cattle. She started her farm in 2003 by buying a cow and some sheep with 18,000 som. Due to her diligence Tumara now has four milk cows, ten sheep and two horses and makes 12,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In order to further develop her business Tumara has turned to micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to purchase another milk cow. Tumara plans to invest the profits from this loan back into her business so that in the future she will be able to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 24-year-old single man who has been working at selling coffee for two years in his village's center. He is a hard worker who is responsible for raising seven people in his family. This puts much pressure on him to keep developing his business to make sure his income is enough to supply their needs.
Mohamad is applying for a YOUTH loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy an ice cream machine, a smoothie maker, and a ready-to-sell ice cream freezer. 
Through the requested loan, Mohamad ensures additional business which will reflect positively on his income during the summer season, especially since his espresso coffee van is located in a very attractive place in his village.
He hopes to stay capable of supplying his family's needs and expanding his business as much as he can in a well managed way.

loans.use: To buy an ice cream machine, a smoothie maker, and a ready-to-sell ice cream freezer

loans.name: Atyrkul

texts.ru:
Атыркул 62 года, вдова. Атыркул в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством , стартовав в 1990 году с суммы 5,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Атыркул на сегодняшний день имеет 1 дойную корову с приплодом, 5 овец, ее прибыль составляет (KGS) 4,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Атыркул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку мелкого рогатого скота.  Доходы от кредита Атыркул  планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность помочь внукам в обустройстве.
texts.en: Atyrkul is 62 year old widow. In order to support her family she raises livestock. She started her farm in 1990 with 5,000 som. Due to her diligence Atyrkul now has a milk cow and calf and five sheep and makes 4,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In order to further develop her business Atyrkul has turned to micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to purchase more sheep. Atyrkul plans to invest the profits from this loan back into her business so that in the future she can help to support her grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Djamilya

texts.ru:
Джамийле 39 лет, воспитывает 3 дочерей. Джамийля в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи,  занимается полеводством , стартовав  в 2002 году с суммы 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду,  Джамийля на сегодняшний день имеет прибыль (KGS) 10,000 сом в месяц с продажи сельхозкультур. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Джамийля обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку минеральных удобрений и семян фасоли .  Доходы от кредита Джамийля планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность обучить дочерей.
texts.en: Djamilya is 39 years old and is raising three daughters. In order to support her family she grows crops for sale. She started her farm in 2002 with 20,000 som. Due to her diligence Djamilya now makes 10,000 som (KGS) monthly profits by selling her produce. In order to further develop her business Djamilya has turned to micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to purchase fertilizer and bean seeds. Djamilya plans to invest the profits from this loan back into her business so that she can pay for her daughters' education in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Hellen

texts.es: Hellen, está casada, tiene la edad de 33 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito va compra unas novillas para tenerlas en un terreno apto para la explotación. Ella siempre se ha dedicado a  tener de estos animales y le ha ido muy bien a la hora de venderlas ya grandes, por lo cual quiere volver a comprar más para así tener más a su poder. Ella espera tenerla rápido para la venta y poder venderlas en tiempos buenos para así generar más ingresos para su bienestar y darle una ayuda a su esposo con los deberes de su hogar.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Hellen is married. She is 35 years old. She lives with her husband and their 2 children, who are her greatest priority. With the loan, she will buy some heifers to keep on some land that is suitable to use. She has always raised these animals, and it has gone very well for her at the time of sale when they are big. For this reason, she wants to again buy more to thus have more in her care. She hopes to have them ready for sale quickly and be able to sell them in good times and to thus generate more income for their well-being and to help her husband with the household obligations. This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had other previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with a better payment plan and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy heifers to raise

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru:
Розе 43 года, воспитывает дочку. Роза в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи,  занимается полеводством, животноводством и продажей молочной продукции , стартовав  в 2000 году с суммы 35,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду,  Роза на сегодняшний день имеет прибыль (KGS) 5,000 сом в месяц с продажи молока. Доходы позволили ей купить дом для своей семьи. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Роза обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота.  Доходы от кредита Роза планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность оплатить обучение дочки.
texts.en: Roza is 43 years old and is raising a daughter. In order to support her family she offers produce, livestock and diary for sale. She started her farm in 2000 with 35,000 som. Due to her diligence Roza now makes 5,000 som (KGS) monthly profits by selling milk. Profits from her business made it possible for Roza to purchase a house for her family. In order to further develop her business Roza has turned to micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to purchase more livestock. Roza plans to invest the profits from this loan back into her business so that she can pay for her daughter's education in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Dilbaara

texts.ru:
Дилбааре 51 год, воспитывает 3 детей. Дилбаар в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи,  занимается полеводством, животноводством и продажей молочной продукции, стартовав  в 1988 году с суммы 2,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду,  Дилбаар на сегодняшний день имеет 2 головы дойных коров и 10 овец, что позволяет иметь прибыль 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Дилбаар обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота.  Доходы от кредита Дилбаар планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, чтобы иметь возможность оплатить накопить на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Dilbaara is 51 years old and has raised three children. In order to support her family she offers produce, livestock and diary for sale. She started her farm in 1988 with 2,000 som. Due to her diligence Dilbaara now has two milk cows and ten sheep and makes 5,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In order to further develop her business Dilbaara has turned to micro-finance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS). She will use this loan to purchase more livestock. Dilbaara plans to invest the profits from this loan back into her business so that she can pay for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Felix Antonio

texts.es:
Félix, 46 años de edad, de oficio agricultor , originario de la comunidad La Joya en las afueras de Boaco, padre de 6 hijos solo un hijo estudia el 4to grado de la primaria . 
El aprendió este oficio desde su niñez pues su padre le enseño a cultivar la tierra , limpiar el terreno y  criar animales. Al casarse se independizo de su padre y comenzó a trabajar en su propia huerta sembrando maíz y frijol, actividad que hoy en día realiza con sus  dos hijos mayores y la ayuda de un mozo. El está requiriendo el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para sembrar maíz y frijol. El espera sacar una buena de producción de excelente calidad y altos rendimientos. Una vez cancelado su crédito desea comprar una ternera pies desea invertir en crianza de ganado ya que es una actividades que genera ingresos extras y le ayudaría a mejorar poco a poco su finca y aprovechar el pasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Felix is 46 years old and a farmer.  He is originally froM La Joya, outside or  Boaco.  He is the father of six children and only one son attends the fourth grade.

He learned this trade when he was a boy and his father taught him to work the land, clean it, and care for animals.  He started working on his own when he married and began raising corn and beans.  He now does this with the help of his two oldest sons and a helper.  He needs this loan So he can buy compost, fertilizer, and pay for labor to plant corn and beans.  He expects to have a good product of excellent quality and high yield.  Once he repays the loan, he wants to buy a steer to invest in raising livestock.  This is one of the activities that generates extra income and it will help him improve his farm little by little so he can take advantage of the grassland he has.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay for labor.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Felipa tiene 66 años de edad, es viuda pero tiene un hijo, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que desde muy temprana edad se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y a la agricultura. Desde hace varios años  pertenece al banco comunal “El Balcon” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes. 

Felipa nació en el distrito de Challabamba pero vive en la comunidad de Majopata anexo de la comunidad de Carnicero. (La comunidad de Majopata está ubicada en el distrito del Challabamba en la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: Felipa is a 66-year-old widow with no children. She is a hardworking and enterprising person who from a very young age has made a living raising small animals and farming. She has belonged to "El Balcon" community bank for a number of years and is requesting a loan to purchase guinea pigs. Felipa was born in the district of Challabamba but lives in the community of Majopata, annexed from the community of Carnicero. (Majopata is located in the district of Challabamba, province of Paucartambo, department of Cusco).

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Mullobobo

texts.ru: Муллобобо родился в селе далеко от города. В нашу организацию он обратился за кредитом в первый раз для расширения своего бизнеса. Он занимается в основном сельхоз бизнесом. У него в собственности имеется зерновой комбайн и бортовой газель. Со своим комбайном он собирает урожай в разных районах.  Бортовой газель он использует для перевозки зерна. Данным бизнесом  он занимается уже 14 лет и имеет хороший опыт. В этом бизнесе ему помогает второй сын, а первый сын находится в Российской Федерации уже в течение года. Его жена Санавбар занимается животноводством и выращиванием сельхоз культуры. Муллобобо обратился в нашу организацию с надеждой получить займ в размере 5000 сомони, который хочет использовать для покупки запасных частей комбайна и его ремонта. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mullobobo was born in a remote village far from urban centers. He has turned to our organization for a loan for the first time in order to expand his business. Mullobobo works in agribusiness and he owns a grain combine and a small truck. He uses his combine to harvest grain for other farmers in the region and the truck for transporting the grain. This has been his source of income for 14 years and Mullobobo has a lot of experience. Also, his second son helps him drive the vehicles while his first son has been working as a migrant in Russia for over a year. Mullobobo's wife Sanavbar raises livestock and grows crops on their own farm. Mullobobo has turned to us for a loan of 5000 somoni which he will use to purchase spare parts and repair his grain combine. He awaits your kindess.

loans.use: To repair combine which is the source of his income

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод проживает в селе, далеко от центра города и развития. Дилшод основной кормилец большой семьи. У него двое  детей и они оба не совершеннолетние.  Дилшод занимается ремонтом частных домов, свой первый опыт он приобрел в Российской Федерации. Каждый год он уезжает в Российскую Федерацию с мая до октября. Зимой  в селе занимается внутренней отделкой домов. Живет в отцовском доме и хочет заработать деньги на благоустройства отцовского дома. Также он засеивает 1 га участок условно орошаемого участка земли зерновыми и  0,60 га картофелем и доход от этой деятельности, он использует для содержания семьи. Полевыми работами и уход за скотом ложится на плечи его жены Малики, когда он уезжает в Российскую Федерацию. Он планирует уехать в Российскую Федерацию, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки авиабилета.
texts.en: Dilshod lives in a village far from urban centers. He is the main provider for his large family and has two underage children. Dilshod repairs private houses and has learned this trade in while working in Russia. He travels to Russia every year between May and October, and spends the winter fixing houses in his home village. Dilshod's family lives in his father's old house and he wants to save enough money to properly repair it. He also grows grain on one hectare of irrigated land and grows potatoes on 0.6 hectare. The profits from farming are used to support his family. As he is gone during the summer the main burden of farming and taking care of livestock falls on his wife Malika. Dilshod plans to go to Russia this summer as well, but has no money for the airplane ticket. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase a airfare.

loans.use: to buy an airplane ticket for job hunting in Russia

loans.name: Sandra Piedad

texts.es:
Sandra de 35 años de edad, es ama de casa y madre de dos hijos, debido a las condiciones de su hogar, decidió buscar una fuente de ingresos y colaborarle a su esposo con los gastos. Optó por dedicarse a la venta de accesorios, debido a que le brindaba el espacio para estar pendiente de sus hijos. Hoy lleva nueve años realizando la actividad y segura que es rentable. Por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de mercancía con el propósito de cumplir con los pedidos solicitados por sus clientes.

Sueña con brindarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad y ofrecerles la oportunidad de ingresar a la universidad.
texts.en: Sandra is a 35-year-old housewife and mother of two children. Because of conditions in her home, she decided to look for a source of income to help her husband with expenses. She decided to make a living selling accessories, since she could do it while caring for her children. Today, she has been doing this activity for nine years and assures that it is lucrative. She is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise (like earrings and necklaces) with the goal of completing her customers' orders. Her dream is to give her children a quality education and offer them the opportunity to enroll in college.

loans.use: to purchase accessories (earrings, necklaces).

loans.name: Nizomitdin

texts.ru: Низомитдину 45 лет. Он добрый и целеустремленный человек. Низомитдин женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Его жена домохозяйка и поэтому Низомитдин является основным кормильцем в семье. Более 25 лет он занимается скотоводством. Он имеет большой опыт по данному бизнесу. Низомитдин откармливает скот дома, где имеет удобный коровник. Его сын не имеет постоянное место работы и поэтому он планирует уехать в Российскую Федерацию. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для его сына. Он ждет вашу доброту и обещает, как добросовестный человек погасить займ во время.
texts.en: Nizomitdin is 45 years old. He is a kinda and goal oriented man. Nizomitdin is married and is raising four children. His wife is a homemaker and Nizomitdin is the main provider for the family. He has been raising cattle for 25 years and has a lot of experience.
